price: 110. Kaši тропа baye batikaki mboka ya bopagano bakei na mboka ya boyambi sima ya komekama na bango, тре babundaki тропа Allah тре bakangaki mitema тре bayikaki mpiko, ya sólo, Nkolo wayo na sima na yango azali molimbisi atonda mawa.
arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لِلَّذِينَ هَاجَرُواْ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا فُتِنُواْ ثُمَّ جَٰهَدُواْ وَصَبَرُوٓاْ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهَا لَغَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: thumma inna rabbaka lilladhīna hājarū min baʿdi mā futinū thumma jāhadū waṣabarū inna rabbaka min baʿdihā laghafūrun raḥīmun
translations: they had been put to trials
